snippet: The European Union plans to set up an international tribunal focusing exclusively on crimes believed to have been committed by Kosovo’s ethnic Albanian rebels during their war with Serbia, officials said.
abstract: European Union plans to set up an international tribunal focusing exclusively on crimes believed to have been committed by Kosovo's ethnic Albanian rebels during their war with Serbia.
lead_paragraph: The European Union plans to set up an international tribunal focusing exclusively on crimes believed to have been committed by Kosovo’s ethnic Albanian rebels during their war with Serbia, officials said.

headline.main: Kosovo: European Union Plans War Crimes Tribunal
headline.print_headline: Kosovo: European Union Plans War Crimes Tribunal
